info.title: Avi SSLKeyAndCertificate Object API
info.description:
##CLI##
```
- configure sslkeyandcertificate <key>
- show sslkeyandcertificate <key>
- delete sslkeyandcertificate <key>
```

##Examples##
- **sslkeyandcertificate_example_1**: To generate a self-signed certificate
  ```json
    {u'self_signed': True, u'name': u'mycert', u'locality': u'Sunnyvale', u'country': u'US', u'common_name': u'ACME Company', u'state': u'CA', u'key_params': {u'rsa_params': {u'key_size': u'SSL_KEY_1024_BITS'}, u'algorithm': u'SSL_KEY_ALGORITHM_RSA'}, u'organization': u'ACME Company'}
  ```

- **sslkeyandcertificate_example_2**: To generate a CA-signed certificate use the following sample. This will provide a Certificate Signing Request that you will have to use to get a CA-siged certificate
  ```json
    {u'name': u'mycert2', u'locality': u'Sunnyvale', u'country': u'US', u'common_name': u'ACME Company', u'state': u'CA', u'key_params': {u'rsa_params': {u'key_size': u'SSL_KEY_1024_BITS'}, u'algorithm': u'SSL_KEY_ALGORITHM_RSA'}, u'organization': u'ACME Company'}
  ```

- **sslkeyandcertificate_example_3**: To import a CA-signed certificate
  ```json
    {u'certificate': u'
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
MIICmTCCAgKgAwIBAgIJAKfrg8i8iZZqMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBCwUAMFAxCzAJBgNV

7dyeAkeCyUjZrbqFRNsCf969aUSIE8pARjSnT9P4otOvIMCaIN215F0nzKKZbsIL
K4pA6A0h5GSd+aqol6P2vAWzLNE+kUbrE/PcZu9pozWp0GdoiAEu+BnqwWrC
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
'}
  ```

parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. If unset, the version will be defaulted to 16.4.3. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.

parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid
parameters.name: refers_to

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid
parameters.name: referred_by

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

key_size.description: Enum options - SSL_KEY_1024_BITS, SSL_KEY_2048_BITS, SSL_KEY_3072_BITS, SSL_KEY_4096_BITS.

ec_params.description: Placeholder for description of property ec_params of obj type SSLKeyParams field type str  type object

rsa_params.description: Placeholder for description of property rsa_params of obj type SSLKeyParams field type str  type object

certificate_management_profile_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type CertificateManagementProfile.

hardwaresecuritymodulegroup_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type HardwareSecurityModuleGroup.

key_params.description: Placeholder for description of property key_params of obj type SSLKeyAndCertificate field type str  type object

uuid.description: Unique object identifier of the object.

enckey_base64.description: Encrypted private key corresponding to the private key (e.g. those generated by an HSM such as Thales nShield).

dynamic_params.description: Dynamic parameters needed for certificate management profile.

certificate.description: Placeholder for description of property certificate of obj type SSLKeyAndCertificate field type str  type object

enckey_name.description: Name of the encrypted private key (e.g. those generated by an HSM such as Thales nShield).

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Tenant.

ca_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type SSLKeyAndCertificate.

is_dynamic.description: Placeholder for description of property is_dynamic of obj type CustomParams field type str  type boolean

is_sensitive.description: Placeholder for description of property is_sensitive of obj type CustomParams field type str  type boolean

key_params.description: Placeholder for description of property key_params of obj type SSLCertificate field type str  type object

subject.description: Placeholder for description of property subject of obj type SSLCertificate field type str  type object

subject_alt_names.description: subjectAltName that provides additional subject identities.

self_signed.description: Placeholder for description of property self_signed of obj type SSLCertificate field type str  type boolean

chain_verified.description: Placeholder for description of property chain_verified of obj type SSLCertificate field type str  type boolean

issuer.description: Placeholder for description of property issuer of obj type SSLCertificate field type str  type object
